search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.x509 by _time, x509.certificate_subject, x509.certificate_issuer | rename x509.certificate_subject AS certificate_subject, x509.certificate_issuer AS certificate_issuer | rex field=certificate_subject "(?<=CN=)(?P<Subject_CN1>[^,]+)(?:,CN=(?P<Subject_CN2>[^,]+))?(?:,CN=(?P<Subject_CN3>[^,]+))?(?:,OU=(?P<Subject_OU1>[^,]+))?(?:,OU=(?P<Subject_OU2>[^,]+))?(?:,OU=(?P<Subject_OU3>[^,]+))?(?:,O=(?P<Subject_O>[^,]+))?(?:,L=(?P<Subject_L>[^,]+))?(?:,ST=(?P<Subject_ST>[^,]+))?(?:,C=(?P<Subject_C>[^,]+))?" | rex field=certificate_issuer "(?<=CN=)(?P<Issuer_CN1>[^,]+)(?:,CN=(?P<Issuer_CN2>[^,]+))?(?:,CN=(?P<Issuer_CN3>[^,]+))?(?:,OU=(?P<Issuer_OU1>[^,]+))?(?:,OU=(?P<Issuer_OU2>[^,]+))?(?:,OU=(?P<Issuer_OU3>[^,]+))?(?:,O=(?P<Issuer_O>[^,]+))?(?:,L=(?P<Issuer_L>[^,]+))?(?:,ST=(?P<Issuer_ST>[^,]+))?(?:,C=(?P<Issuer_C>[^,]+))?" | where Subject_CN1=Issuer_CN1 | fillnull value="-" Issuer_CN1, Subject_CN1, Issuer_CN2, Subject_CN2, Issuer_OU1, Subject_OU1, Issuer_OU2, Subject_OU2, Issuer_OU3, Subject_OU3, Issuer_P, Subject_P, Issuer_L, Subject_L, Issuer_ST, Subejct_ST, Issuer_C, Subejct_C | table _time, certificate_issuer, certificate_subject, Issuer_CN1, Subject_CN1, Issuer_CN2, Subject_CN2, Issuer_OU1, Subject_OU1, Issuer_OU2, Subject_OU2, Issuer_OU3, Subject_OU3, Issuer_P, Subject_P, Issuer_L, Subject_L, Issuer_ST, Subejct_ST, Issuer_C, Subejct_C

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.Notice by _time, Notice.sub, Notice.msg, Notice.dst, Notice.p, Notice.uid | rename Notice.sub AS sub, Notice.msg AS msg, Notice.dst AS dst, Notice.p AS p, Notice.uid AS uid | eval Time=_time | table sub, msg, dst, p, uid, _time, Time
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.x509 by _time, x509.certificate_subject, x509.certificate_issuer | stats count

table.title: Certificate To IP Correlation Via Notice.log

search.query: | where like (sub, $subject|s$) | rename sub AS "Certificate Subject", msg AS "Message", dst AS "Destination IP", p AS "Destination Port"
